SELECT * FROM notice
WHERE
notice_subject LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
notice_content LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
notice_subject LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR notice_content LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY notice_re_ref DESC , notice_re_seq ASC LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice
WHERE
notice_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
notice_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
